resources.string:
Shower Timer Talking uses Android’s Text To Speech engine to talk, so the talking is more than a little robotic. If you use an Android version prior to 5.0, you will be might be asked to install a “high quality text to speech” engine. If you choose to do this, the quality of the speaking will be better.
\n\nThe app allows you to set your name and profile photo using Facebook or Google login. If you choose to use this feature, the app does not collect any data from these services beyond your username and profile photo.

The app has “in app” purchases. This allows you to donate to the continued development of the app. I think the donation model is better than having advertising in the app or charging for the app before you can use it. All donations are much appreciated.


If you have some questions about the app, please send me an email using the Feedback menu option.
